alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 4:24AM EDT until April 13 at 7:11AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Lexington, Calhoun and Richland Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Richland and Calhoun Counties. North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Congaree River At Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:25 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 116.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:25 AM EDT Wednesday was 119.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 110.1 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 430 PM EDT.
